pullRequest.title: Add digital twins constants file to house json property names
pullRequest.bodyText:
Users can directly use these constants when defining their POJO classes.
Also add a note in our BasicDigitalTwin/BasicRelationship/ComponentMetadata classes about how they only work with Jackson serializers

commit.message:
Add digital twins constants file to house json property names

Users can directly use these constants when defining their POJO classes.

Also add a note in our BasicDigitalTwin/BasicRelationship/ComponentMetadata classes about how they only work with Jackson serializers

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+
+package com.azure.digitaltwins.core.models;
+
+/**
+ * String constants for use in JSON de/serialization for digital twins, digital twin relationships,
+ * and digital twin components.
+ */
+public class DigitalTwinsJsonPropertyNames {
+    /**
+     * The JSON property name for the Id field on a digital twin.
+     */
+    public static final String DIGITAL_TWIN_ID = "$dtId";
+
+    /**
+     * The JSON property name for the ETag field on a digital twin.
+     */
+    public static final String DIGITAL_TWIN_E_TAG = "$etag";
+
+    /**
+     * The JSON property name for the metadata field on a digital twin.%
+     */
+    public static final String DIGITAL_TWIN_METADATA = "$metadata";
+
+    /**
+     * The JSON property name for the model field on a digital twin metadata or component metadata.
